featured.text: According to this passage, many people now collect athletes’ and VIPs’ signatures __________.

definition.zh_def: 一種高效的圖像處理庫，專門用於處理大型圖像和圖像數據。
definition.en_def: A high-performance image processing library designed for handling large images and image data.
definition.example: The vips library allows for fast processing of high-resolution images.
